info.name: Paranasal air sinus: Sphenoidal
info.description: The sphenoidal air sinuses are located in the body of the sphenoid bone and may extend into the wings of this bone.  They are unevenly divided and separated by a bony septum.  Very thin plates of bone separate these fragile sinuses from many important structures:  the optic nerves and chiasm, the pituitary gland, the internal carotid arteries and the cavernous sinuses.
